bloodfire_rush.name: Bloodfire Rush
bloodfire_rush.effect: When you take damage, whether you want it to or not, your speed increases by 2 until the end of your next turn. This can only occur once per round.

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.trigger: A creature deals damage to you that leaves you dying.
relentless.effect: You make a free strike against any creature. If the creature is reduced to 0 Stamina by your attack, you can spend 1 Recovery.
